surface_layer.definition: A molecule that transmits a signal between cells or within a cell.

deep_layer.mechanism: Binds to a receptor and initiates a signaling cascade.
deep_layer.origin: Synthesized within cells or received from external sources.

SPATIAL.location: Variable, depending on the specific messenger (e.g., nerve: along nerve pathways; hormone: throughout the bloodstream; mRNA: cytoplasm and nucleus)
